channel.title: Comments on: The Surrounding Game Package Part 1

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Weird! You should definitely contact them about it. I don't see why they would single out Canada. Haha. Go players unite all around! =D
item.content:encoded: Weird! You should definitely contact them about it. I don’t see why they would single out Canada. Haha. Go players unite all around! =D

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. Well of course I'm optimistic! I really want it to come out asap! XD But in reality, you're probably right. 2014 sounds like a much more realistic date.
item.content:encoded: Haha. Well of course I’m optimistic! I really want it to come out asap! XD But in reality, you’re probably right. 2014 sounds like a much more realistic date.

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.description: Mmmm, that seems awfully optimistic. I'd bet sometime in 2014.
item.content:encoded: Mmmm, that seems awfully optimistic. I’d bet sometime in 2014.

item.title: By: Todd Bowlby
item.dc:creator: Todd Bowlby
item.description: Cool stuff! I tried to donate, but their form has issues with my address and won't accept it for some reason, either because I'm in Canada or because I'm in the Territories, not sure which. I should write them about it, I suppose.
item.content:encoded: Cool stuff! I tried to donate, but their form has issues with my address and won’t accept it for some reason, either because I’m in Canada or because I’m in the Territories, not sure which. I should write them about it, I suppose.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: No official date has been released yet. I'm really hoping that it will be done some time this year. *fingers crossed*
item.content:encoded: No official date has been released yet. I’m really hoping that it will be done some time this year. *fingers crossed*

item.title: By: Moboy78
item.dc:creator: Moboy78
item.description: when does the movie come out?
